mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, p.point_time, p.point_reason, p.points_earned, p.usage_time, p.usage_type, p.total_points, c.coupon_id, c.issue_date, c.use_date, c.is_used FROM Users u LEFT JOIN Points p ON u.user_id = p.user_id LEFT JOIN UserCoupons c ON u.user_id = c.user_id ORDER BY u.user_id, p.point_time, c.issue_date;

SELECT u.user_id, u.name, COALESCE(SUM(p.total_points), 0) AS total_points, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN uc.is_used = FALSE THEN uc.coupon_id END), 0) AS unused_coupons FROM Users u LEFT JOIN Points p ON u.user_id = p.user_id LEFT JOIN UserCoupons uc ON u.user_id = uc.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id}
